file_insights.purpose: Implement a modular, extensible tool executor architecture

patterns_discovered: Extensible error handling with custom error types
gotchas_discovered: Conservative default of 1 maximum concurrent execution
Placeholder implementations for ExecuteAsync and ExecuteMany
Context cancellation and timeout handling requires careful management

approach_outcome.primary_goal: Implement Executor with synchronous Execute() method
future_work: Enhance ExecuteMany with true concurrent execution

recommendations: Implement comprehensive unit tests for Execute() method
Add more robust logging for tool execution
Implement full concurrent execution in ExecuteMany
Expand error handling with more specific error types
